Comment: I’ve noticed that there’s Pro-Palestine protests and Pro-Palestinian protests.  Originally I took them to be the same but you can support and advocate for the welfare of palestinian people but still be against the establishment of a Palestine state.  Anarchists and humanitarian mentalities would fit in here.  And naturally you can support the creation of a state of Palestine without necessarily prioritizing the welfare and human rights of the people though this would seem rare in the west and more of a Hamas or jihad mentality.   All that said, it’s outrageous that police would raid pro-Palestinian targets over Pro-Palestine targets.  It’s dark and dystopian.
